#summary Various file formats handled by EARS
#labels manual

== Query file ==
Controlled by parameter `QueryFileFormat`. 
A query file may contain any number of queries, each between `<DOC qID>`, `</DOC>` tags, where `qID` is a unique query identifier.

|| *Format* || *Syntax* || *Example* || 
|| `0` (default) || `<DOC qID>`<br>`term_1`<br>`...`<br>`term_n`<br>`</DOC>` || `<DOC q-01>`<br>`solar`<br>`energy`<br>`</DOC>` ||
|| `1` || `<DOC qID>`<br>`term_1;weight_1`<br>`...`<br>`term_n;weight_n`<br>`</DOC>` || `<DOC q-01>`<br>`solar;0.55`<br>`energy;0.45`<br>`</DOC>` ||

== Document-entity association file ==
Controlled by parameter `AssociationFileFormat`. 

|| *Format* || *Syntax* || *Example* || 
|| `0` (default) || `EntityID DOCNO` || `Entity-01 Doc-01`<br>`Entity-02 Doc-01`<br>`Entity-01 Doc-02` ||
|| `1` || `EntityID DOCNO weight` || `Entity-01 Doc-01 0.5`<br>`Entity-02 Doc-01 0.5`<br>`Entity-01 Doc-02 0.2` ||
|| `2` || `EntityAlias DOCNO` || `Person-01-name Doc-01`<br>`Person-01-email Doc-01`<br>`Person-02-name Doc-01` ||
|| `3` || `EntityAlias DOCNO weight` || `Person-01-name Doc-01 0.1`<br>`Person-01-email Doc-01 0.3`<br>`Person-02-name Doc-01 0.2` ||

Notes:
  * columns are separated by whitespace
  * `DOCNO` denotes the external document ID 
  * `weight` is a non-negative numeric value (integer or real)
  * when `EntityAlias` is used, an !EntityAlias-EntityID mapping needs to be provided; see [EntityRepresentation] and below

== !EntityAlias-EntityID mapping file ==
Location defined in parameter `entityAliasMapping`

Format: `EntityAlias EntityID` pairs per line, where `EntityAlias` and `EntityID` are strings that contain only non-whitespace characters.

Example:
{{{
johnsmith John_Smith
john.smith@email.com John_Smith
anotheralias John_Smith
}}}
